pr_title: ISPN-12205 Add RocksDB Meta Column Family

timeline.bodyText: Do we have a JIRA for this?
timeline.author: wburns

replies.bodyText: Maybe for this iteration we can just verify the version and if there is a mismatch log a WARN/INFO message?
replies.author: wburns

replies.bodyText: Tbh as this is the first version that has this logic, I'm not sure how there could be a mismatch. It's also possible (in fact desirable) in future versions that loading from a previous major should not require migration, so logging would only add noise IMO.
replies.author: ryanemerson

timeline.bodyText: I am not sure we want to do this if the versions don't match.
timeline.author: wburns

replies.bodyText: My plan was that if there are any incompatibilies they will be handled via the migration logic between x and latest version, or if this is not possible an exception is thrown before this statement is reached.
replies.author: ryanemerson

replies.bodyText: Oh I agree. I am more saying in case we never get this completed. I know how some features have ideas for the future but it never comes to fruition.
replies.author: wburns

replies.bodyText: Ok. I've added a variable to prevent this in the meantime.
replies.author: ryanemerson
